Description: For sale is my Gibson Limited Run ES-335 Metallic Semi-Hollow Electric Guitar, in the wood rose color way. Condition is Used but it's in A to A- condition, as it has been played, but very few imperfections, zero scratches on the pick guard and nothing I could capture on a photo.  This guitar comes with the original case as well, which does have a few scratches on the top and bottom, which you will see in the photo's.  I purchased this guitar brand new in April of 2018 for $3,849.00 USD.  It's one of only x50 produced in the rare wood rose color way.  It comes with original Gibson hardshell case and all accessories/paper work that were included with the guitar when purchased new.  I purchased this in the U.S., from an authorized Gibson dealer, and I'm selling it from the U.S. where it has always lived.  Looks like most of these for sale on ebay right now have been gobbled up by overseas buyers and the pricing has been jacked up considerably, as these are collectors items.  Amazing guitar, very fair price, and fast shipping. GOOD LUCK! This guitar has a bit more to it than the other listings you'll see:   First, I have replaced the bridge pick up with a far superior Gibson P94 ($140).  The P94 is the most amazing pick up that Gibson makes.  All the lows from a humbucker, the highs from single coil and the most amazing mids you've ever heard.  Of course the original bridge pick up is included if you desire, but if you plan on playing this guitar, I would try it as is first. Second, this guitar has been re-wired with the Mojotone Premium ES-335 wiring kit ($140).  Simply the best electronics for the best guitar in the world.   Third, I've replaced the stock tuners (Grover "milk bottle" tuners) with the Gibson Vintage Nickel Machine heads w/ Pearloid buttons ($70).  Not an upgrade in quality, but style wise this was a must have.  Original Grover tuners included, if you would like to revert to the stock tuners. ALL of these upgrades listed above were professionally installed by Portland Fret Works (install value $250)!!!  Please let me know if you have any questions or would like to see any more photo's.  Happy to assist in any way.   GUITAR SPECS: Body Body shape:Double cutaway Body type:Semi-hollow or chambered body Body material:Laminated Top wood:3-plyMaple/poplar/maple Body wood:3-plyMaple/poplar/maple Body finish:Gloss Orientation:Right handed Neck Neck shape:C roundedRolled edge binding Neck wood:QuartersawnMahogany Joint:Set-in Scale length:24.75 in. Truss rod:Standard Neck finish:Gloss Fingerboard Material:DarkRosewood Radius:12 in. Fret size:Medium jumbo Number of frets:22 Inlays:Small block Nut width/material1.687 in. (42.8 mm)Bone Pickups Configuration:HH Neck:MHS humbuckerAlnico Middle: Bridge:MHS humbuckerAlnico Brand:Gibson Active or passive pickups:Passive Series or parallel:Parallel Piezo:No Active EQ:No Special electronics: Controls Control layout:Volume 1, volume 2, tone 1, tone 2 Pickup switch:3-way Coil tap or split:No Kill switch:No Hardware Bridge type:Fixed Bridge design:ABR-1Titanium saddles Tailpiece:Stopbar Tuning machines:Grover Rotomatic"Milk Bottle" Color:Nickel Other Number of strings:6-string Special features: Case:Gig bag Accessories: Country of origin:United States GIBSON P94 PICK UP SPECS: The Gibson P94 gives you the best of both worlds: Gibson’s famous P90-style singlecoil pickup in a traditional humbucker-size housing. Replacing a traditional humbucker pickup with the P94 requires no additional routing or other modifications to the guitar. The P94 features the same vintage, enamel-like coated wiring and Alnico V magnets that are used inside the legendary P90, delivering more sustain and output than a traditional singlecoil pickup but with deep lows, growling mids and sizzling highs. In solid body guitars, take advantage of the P94’s ability to easily overdrive your amplifier, or simply "clean up" by backing down on the volume. In an archtop guitar, you can realize the rich, full tone of the smoothest jazz riffs. The P94R (neck) has reverse polarity for a hum-free operation when used together with the P94T (bridge). Each P94 comes with shielded, three-conductor lead wiring, and is fully wax potted to protect against unwanted microphonic feedback. Output: 9.8 Position: Both Magnet: Alnico V Wiring: 2-Conductor Details: 50’s historic tone, warm and soulful in a Humbucker size MOJOTONE PREMIUM WIRING KIT: It's all about the tone. At one point or another, it is essential for any guitarist to upgrade or replace the electronics in their guitar. Each component is just as important as the next, which is why Mojotone has created a pre-wired assembly with the highest quality components on the market. Bring your guitar to life with the smooth taper Bourns potentiometers and creamy sounding paper and oil Vitamin T capacitors for a vast improvement over your stock electronics.  This is a standard ES-335 style kit that utilizes '50s style wiring for maximum tone. Designed specifically with premium short shaft Bourns 95 potentiometers to resist dust and moisture and outlast any standard carbon path potentiometer. Use 24-knurl push on knobs only and may require enlarging holes to fit Asian made guitars with metric pots. Includes: Bourns 95 premium short shaft potentiometers Switchcraft short straight toggle switch Switchcraft mono input jack Vitamin T Oil Filled .022uf capacitor Shielded cloth covered 22 gauge black wire Handmade in the USA
Title: Gibson Limited Run ES-335 Metallic Semi-Hollow Electric Guitar (Wood Rose)
